statements: DELETE FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 50 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND awareness_level < 3;
DELETE FROM demographic_data WHERE age < 18 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Flu Vaccination';
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE city = 'New York' AND performance_score < 0.5
DELETE FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 3 AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01';
